data.text:
Daytime Emmy Awards Winners' List: 'General Hospital' dominates award show with 6 wins

AP / Dec 16, 2023, 19:38 (IST)

The Bold and the Beautiful stars Thorsten Kaye and Jacqueline MacInnes Wood won lead acting honors at the Daytime Emmy Awards. General Hospital dominated the night with six trophies, including outstanding drama series. Other winners include Robert Gossett, Eden McCoy, Alley Mills, Susan Lucci, and Kelly Clarkson. The awards show, celebrating its 50th anniversary, was the first major awards show to return since the end of the writers' and actors' strikes. The ceremony took place at the Westin Bonaventure hotel in Los Angeles.

Kate's icy wardrobe on scorching day

Nov 18, 2008, 17:21 (IST)

It looked like Kate Beckinsale had a wardrobe malfunction when she sported a big woollen snow beanie and thick denim jeans, while the temperature was a dry 95 degrees.
